required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effects of Peri Partum Integrated Nursing Care Versus Routine Care in Placenta Previa : A Randomized Controlled Trail
clinical_study.official_title: Effects of Peri Partum Integrated Nursing Care Versus Routine Care in Placenta Previa : A Randomized Controlled Trail

brief_summary.textblock: At our institution, the annual number of placenta previa was 494 cases (1.7%); of whom 95 cases (19.2%) were proved to have a placenta accreta. Perioperatively, they are subjected to regular care of a tertiary university hospital. This study aims to determine the effectiveness of peri partum integrated nursing care for the patients with placenta previa versus routine care.

detailed_description.textblock:
Study design:
Experimental design: (randomized control trail)
Setting:
This study will be conducted at Woman's Health Hospital, Assiut University, emergency department and inpatient department.
Sample:
A convenience sample will be used, the total sample will include (100) patients with placenta previa, divided into two group1:1
- group 1: 50 patients study group
- group2: 50 patients control group

primary_outcome.measure: Improved maternal and fetal well beings in cases of placenta previa
primary_outcome.description: Adding an integrated nursing care to the regular care of cases of placenta previa

arm_group.arm_group_label: peri partum integrated nursing care of placenta previa
arm_group.description: Part (1) personal data: Part (2) baseline and characteristics of the patients participants: Tool II- An observation checklist: This tool is develop by researcher according to guideline of Royal College of Obstetricians and Gynaecologists, 2018), and divide into three main parts: preoperative, intraoperative and postoperative. Part (1) pre-operative: includes assessment of : patients general condition investigation reserved blood Hemoglobin level Impact of hysterectomy option. -9- Part (2) Intra-operative: Includes assessment of :- Investigation Vital signs Hypothermia Blood loss I.V fluid Blood gases Fetal condition and APGAR score. Part (3) Post-operative: Includes: maternal complication fetal complication psychological satisfaction

arm_group.arm_group_label: peri partum regular care of placenta previa
arm_group.description: Routine nursing care of all cases of placenta previa (preoperative, intraoperative and postoperative)..

intervention.intervention_name: Integrated Nursing care of placenta previa
intervention.description: Phase I :( preparation phase) Phase II: (Implementation phase) includes Preoperative care , intraoperative care and postoperative care by a nurse. Phase III: (Evaluation phase)
intervention.arm_group_label: peri partum integrated nursing care of placenta previa
peri partum regular care of placenta previa

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Pregnant women with diagnosis of placenta previa.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Other high risk pregnancy cases
